CustomField.description: Image that dispays a priority value, for agent in order to pick the right case
CustomField.formula:
IF( (TechCaseOpenHours__c = 2 ), IMAGE('/resource/1692887644000/SLAYellow?', 'SLA yellow error', -1, -1),
IF( (TechCaseOpenHours__c = 4), IMAGE('/resource/1692887654000/SLAOrange?', 'SLA orange error', -1, -1) , IF( (TechCaseOpenHours__c = 12), IMAGE('/resource/1692887610000/SLARed?', 'SLA red error', -1, -1), IMAGE('/resource/1692887627000/SLAGreen?', 'SLA green error', -1, -1) ) ) )
CustomField.label: SLA Flag
